official-title.#text:
To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United
		  States to extend to 2025 the production certificate program that allows refunds
		  of duties on certain articles produced in United States insular
		  possessions.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text:
Additional U.S.
			 Note 5(h)(i) to chapter 91 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United
			 States is amended by striking

header.#text:
Extension of production
			 certificate program for certain products of United States insular
			 possessions

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1085 IH: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend to 2025 the production certificate program that allows refunds of duties on certain articles produced in United States insular possessions.
